answers.answer: Sorry to hear of the diagnosis...  Unusual to do surgery for cirrhosis unless it is a biopsy.If the surgery can be done through by laparoscopy (a scope), he should be up and around in a day or so.  Same for a needle biopsy.If it is an open procedure, he'll be hurting for a week, but getting around OK in 10 days or so.  Probably no work for 3-4  weeks though.Hope he does well.  Best of luck to you both!

Hello and hope you are doing well.Cirrhosis, with a biopsy done and if the biopsy is positive for evidence of carcinoma, then surgical therapy is needed. Was he diagnosed with a tumor? Recovery will then be based on the extent of spread of the tumor and his general health and co morbid conditions like diabetes.Hope this helped and do keep us posted.
